response.message: Do you guys do telecommute internships or anything for High School level experience?

@Dynamic: nothing currently; we're still a fairly small organization, so it's hard to spare the time needed to give an intern a fair shake. 

If/when we do, it'll probably be an in-office thing, and listed on Careers.
I live in NYC and I need a job! This would totally rule, im going to apply after my show tonight.
The sysadmin link is wrong (it should be http://careers.stackoverflow.com/jobs/24001/senior-systems-administrator-stack-exchange )
Which countries are possible for Telecommute?
Is there any possibilities to join Indian guys?
Are the remote gig's only open for US residents? The webdev one would be very interesting but figured I'd ask before applying.

@ChrisReed and others: We are potentially hiring anywhere in the world.

But as the post says, "there may be some countries that are legally too difficult for us to work with". We have prior experience with hiring in some countries and zero experience with hiring in others, so never know until we try. :)
Is there any cutoff reputation you have set for guys to be considered because the post says active participation in the community.
I would love if you guys had any Entry Level positions, I'm far from being a "top-notch", but I'm on my way :_
The Alot deserves ALL your thanks!
